title: Editor Features
description: Detailed overview of AkiraDocs editor capabilities and features
author: Akira Team

blocks.content: The editor features a powerful drag-and-drop system powered by dnd-kit, allowing intuitive block reordering and organization. Simply click and drag any block to reposition it within your document.

content: File upload support for various media types

blocks.content: Multiple users can work on the same document simultaneously, with real-time updates and conflict resolution. Changes are automatically synchronized across all connected clients.
